description: Information specific to an organism that is a homo sapiens.

body_mass_index.description: The body mass index of the organism.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

ethnicity.description: An array of ontology terms from EMBL-EBI's Ancestry Ontology describing ancestral groups, uncategorised ancestral groups, and population isolates.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

title: homo_sapiens_specific
